general.noResultsMessage: Try changing the filters or search query
general.noRecordsMessage: There are no records to show
general.unsavedChangesTitle: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
general.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you leave this page.
general.includesTaxTooltip: Enter the total amount including tax. The net amount excluding tax will be automatically calculated and saved.

errorBoundary.notFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist.
errorBoundary.internalServerErrorMessage: An error occurred on the server.
errorBoundary.defaultMessage: An error occurred while rendering this page.

products.createProductHint: Create a new product to sell in your store.
products.deleteWarning: You are about to delete the product {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.
products.deleteMedia_one: You are about to delete {{count}} media item. This action cannot be undone.
products.deleteMedia_other: You are about to delete {{count}} media items. This action cannot be undone.
products.deleteMediaAndThumbnail_one: You are about to delete {{count}} media item including the thumbnail. This action cannot be undone.
products.deleteMediaAndThumbnail_other: You are about to delete {{count}} media items including the thumbnail. This action cannot be undone.
products.titleHint: Give your product a short and clear title.<0/>50-60 characters is the recommended length for search engines.
products.descriptionHint: Give your product a short and clear description.<0/>120-160 characters is the recommended length for search engines.
products.discountableHint: When unchecked discounts will not be applied to this product.
products.handleTooltip: The handle is used to reference the product in your storefront. If not specified, the handle will be generated from the product title.
products.noSalesChannels: Not available in any sales channels
products.deleteVariantWarning: You are about to delete the variant {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.

collections.createCollectionHint: Create a new collection to organize your products.
collections.handleTooltip: The handle is used to reference the collection in your storefront. If not specified, the handle will be generated from the collection title.
collections.deleteWarning: You are about to delete the collection {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.
collections.removeSingleProductWarning: You are about to remove the product {{title}} from the collection. This action cannot be undone.
collections.removeProductsWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} product from the collection. This action cannot be undone.
collections.removeProductsWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} products from the collection. This action cannot be undone.

giftCards.createGiftCardHint: Manually create a gift card that can be used as a payment method in your store.
giftCards.deleteGiftCardWarning: You are about to delete the gift card {{code}}. This action cannot be undone.
giftCards.balanceHigherThanValue: The balance cannot be higher than the original amount.
giftCards.expiryDateHint: Countries have different laws regarding gift card expiry dates. Make sure to check local regulations before setting an expiry date.
giftCards.regionHint: Changing the region of the gift card will also change its currency, potentially affecting its monetary value.
giftCards.enabledHint: Specify if the gift card is enabled or disabled.

customers.createCustomerHint: Create a new customer to manage their details.
customers.passwordHint: Create a password for the customer to use when logging in to the storefront. Make sure that you communicate the password to the customer.
customers.changePasswordPromptDescription: You are about to change the password for {{email}}. Make sure that you have communicated the new password to the customer before proceeding.

customerGroups.createCustomerGroupHint: Create a new customer group to segment your customers.
customerGroups.customerAlreadyAdded: The customer has already been added to the group.
customerGroups.removeCustomersWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} customer from the customer group. This action cannot be undone.
customerGroups.removeCustomersWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} customers from the customer group. This action cannot be undone.
customerGroups.deleteCustomerGroupWarning: You are about to delete the customer group {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.

orders.cancelWarning: You are about to cancel the order {{id}}. This action cannot be undone.

payment.title: Payments
payment.isReadyToBeCaptured: Payment {{id}} is ready to be captured.

fulfillment.cancelWarning: You are about to cancel a fulfillment. This action cannot be undone.

discounts.deleteWarning: You are about to delete the discount {{code}}. This action cannot be undone.
discounts.startDateHint: Schedule the discount to activate in the future.
discounts.endDateHint: Schedule the discount to deactivate in the future.
discounts.codeHint: Discount code applies from when you hit the publish button and forever if left untouched.
discounts.usageLimitHint: Limit applies across all customers, not per customer.
discounts.titleHint:
The code your customers will enter during checkout. This will appear on your customer’s invoice.
Uppercase letters and numbers only.
discounts.durationHint: Set the duration of the discount
discounts.noConditions: No conditions are defined for this discount.

excluding.customer_groups: Discount applies to <1>all</1> customer groups except <0/>.
excluding.product_tags: Discount applies to <1>all</1> product tags except <0/>.
excluding.product_collections: Discount applies to <1>all</1> product collections except <0/>.
excluding.product_types: Discount applies to <1>all</1> product types except <0/>.

profile.languageHint: The language you want to use in the admin dashboard. This will not change the language of your store.
profile.userInsightsHint: Share usage insights and help us improve Medusa. You can read more about what we collect and how we use it in our <0>documentation</0>.

users.inviteUserHint: Invite a new user to your store.
users.revokeInviteWarning: You are about to revoke the invite for {{email}}. This action cannot be undone.
users.deleteUserWarning: You are about to delete the user {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.

store.removeCurrencyWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} currency from your store. Ensure that you have removed all prices using the currency before proceeding.
store.removeCurrencyWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} currencies from your store. Ensure that you have removed all prices using the currencies before proceeding.
store.currencyAlreadyAdded: The currency has already been added to your store.

regions.createRegionHint: Manage tax rates and providers for a set of countries.
regions.countriesHint: Add the countries that should be included in this region.
regions.deleteRegionWarning: You are about to delete the region {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.
regions.removeCountriesWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} country from the region. This action cannot be undone.
regions.removeCountriesWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} countries from the region. This action cannot be undone.
regions.removeCountryWarning: You are about to remove the country {{name}} from the region. This action cannot be undone.
regions.taxInclusiveHint: When enabled all prices in the region will be tax inclusive.
regions.providersHint: Add which fulfillment and payment providers should be available in this region.
regions.deleteShippingOptionWarning: You are about to delete the shipping option {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.

shippingOption.createShippingOptionHint: Create a new shipping option for the region.

type.outboundHint: Use this if you are creating a shipping option for sending products to the customer.
type.returnHint: Use this if you are creating a shipping option for the customer to return products to you.

availability.adminOnlyHint: When enabled the shipping option will only be available in the admin dashboard, and not in the storefront.

requirements.label: Requirements
requirements.hint: Specify the requirements for the shipping option.

locations.detailsHint: Specify the details of the location.
locations.deleteLocationWarning: You are about to delete the location {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.
locations.removeSalesChannelsWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channel from the location.
locations.removeSalesChannelsWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channels from the location.

salesChannels.createSalesChannelHint: Create a new sales channel to sell your products on.
salesChannels.enabledHint: Specify if the sales channel is enabled or disabled.
salesChannels.removeProductsWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} product from {{sales_channel}}.
salesChannels.removeProductsWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} products from {{sales_channel}}.
salesChannels.productAlreadyAdded: The product has already been added to the sales channel.
salesChannels.deleteSalesChannelWarning: You are about to delete the sales channel {{name}}. This action cannot be undone.

apiKeyManagement.publishableApiKeyHint: Publishable API keys are used to limit the scope of requests to specific sales channels.
apiKeyManagement.deleteKeyWarning: You are about to delete the API key {{title}}. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeyManagement.revokeKeyWarning: You are about to revoke the API key {{title}}. This action cannot be undone, and the key cannot be used in future requests.
apiKeyManagement.removeSalesChannelWarning: You are about to remove the sales channel {{name}} from the API key. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeyManagement.removeSalesChannelsWarning_one: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channel from the API key. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeyManagement.removeSalesChannelsWarning_other: You are about to remove {{count}} sales channels from the API key. This action cannot be undone.

invite.title: Create your account
invite.emailTooltip: Your email cannot be changed. If you would like to use another email, a new invite must be sent.
invite.invalidInvite: The invite is invalid or has expired.
invite.successHint: Get started with Medusa Admin right away.
invite.invalidTokenHint: Try requesting a new invite link.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.hint: Enter your email below, and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
resetPassword.backToLogin: You can always go back - <0>Log in</0>
resetPassword.invalidTokenHint: Try requesting a new reset link.
resetPassword.successfulRequest: We have sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. If you don't receive an email, please check your spam folder or try again.
